it.lucichkevin.cip.location

Class MockLocationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.lucichkevin.cip.location.MockLocationProvider

  • public class MockLocationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    A mock location provider. It notify a group of listeners (LocationListener object) with a mock location. The provider name is "MOCK_PROVIDER", you can selected a name of your personal provider. Is recommended to use the static method getBestProvider (LocationUtils object) to get the best provider available (it returns MOCK_PROVIDER if this is active :) ), otherwise it searches the real and best provider existing.
    Author:
    Kevin Lucich (15/10/2014)
    See Also:
    MOCK_PROVIDER_NAME, MockLocationProvider.LocationListener, LocationUtils.getBestProvider()
